name: VR Industrial Emergencies
description:
This is a 3-5 minutes VR experience to showcase 3 different interactions.

To be played in an android phone/tablet. Not glasses as player will have to tap the screen.

Player has 3 different tasks to complete but it is definitely not intended as a game. It was done as a small demo to test VR on android phones which worked perfectly.

Here is the demo recorded: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aDiXVOYTT48t

If you want to make something similar I have left the project and specially the cameraman prefab for Unity here: https://miguelsgp.itch.io/vr-unity-camera
